legislation: Pneumoconiosis etc (Workers Compensation) (Payment of Claims) (Amendment) Regulations 2008 Pneumoconiosis etc (Workers Compensation) Act 1979
description: Letter dated 29/02/2008 from Anne Mcguire MP to Joan Whalley MP regarding compensation for miners who worked in private coal mines in the context of the Pneumoconiosis etc (Workers Compensation) (Payment of Claims) (Amendment) Regulations 2008.
